snippet: There was, however, agreement on the outlines of a plan to restore the Constitution and begin a path to elections by November next year.
abstract: Political and military leaders in Burkina Faso fail to name a civilian to lead a transition to democracy after the resignation of Pres Blaise Compaore.

byline.original: By HERVÉ TAOKO and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Hervé Taoko reported from Ouagadougou, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: There was, however, agreement on the outlines of a plan to restore the Constitution and begin a path to elections by November next year.

headline.main: African Mediators Fail to Name a Civilian to Lead Burkina Faso
headline.print_headline: African Mediators Fail to Name a Civilian to Lead Burkina Faso

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
